summary: Triggers workflows in n8n based on events from Microsoft Teams, such as new messages or team updates, using specified configurations.

parameters.name: trigger on
parameters.description: Select the event to trigger the workflow

parameters.name: watch all teams
parameters.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available teams

parameters.name: team
parameters.description: Select a team from the list, enter an ID or a URL

parameters.name: watch all channels
parameters.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available channels

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Select a channel from the list, enter an ID or a URL

parameters.name: watch all chats
parameters.description: Whether to watch for the event in all the available chats

parameters.name: chat
parameters.description: Select a chat from the list, enter an ID or a URL
